a.description: Primary font family for the design system. Use for UI copy and headings. Figma variable type: FONT_FAMILY.

regular.description: Regular font weight (400). Use for default body text. Figma variable type: FONT_WEIGHT.

bold.description: Bold font weight (700). Use for emphasis and headings. Figma variable type: FONT_WEIGHT.

base.description: Base multiplier for typography scale. Change this value to scale all typography proportionally (e.g., 1.5 for 150%). Figma variable type: NUMBER. Purpose: multiply with font sizes to generate final size values.

ratio.description: Major Second scale ratio (1.125). Other common ratios: Minor Second (1.067), Minor Third (1.2), Major Third (1.25), Perfect Fourth (1.333), Golden Ratio (1.618). Figma variable type: NUMBER.

xxs.description: Extra-extra-small (8px). Purpose: micro UI labels / captions. Figma variable type: FONT_SIZE. Recommended CSS var: --font-size-xxs

xs.description: Extra-small (12px). Purpose: small UI text, helper text. Figma variable type: FONT_SIZE. Recommended CSS var: --font-size-xs

sm.description: Small (14px). Purpose: secondary body text, small labels. Figma variable type: FONT_SIZE. Recommended CSS var: --font-size-sm

md.description: Medium (16px). Purpose: primary body copy. Figma variable type: FONT_SIZE. Recommended CSS var: --font-size-md

lg.description: Large (18px). Purpose: lead paragraphs and subheadings. Figma variable type: FONT_SIZE. Recommended CSS var: --font-size-lg

xl.description: Extra-large (20px). Purpose: prominent headings and larger headings. Figma variable type: FONT_SIZE. Recommended CSS var: --font-size-xl

xxl.description: 2x Extra-large (22px). Purpose: section headings. Figma variable type: FONT_SIZE. Recommended CSS var: --font-size-xxl

3xl.description: 3x Extra-large (24px). Purpose: display headings and hero text on small devices. Figma variable type: FONT_SIZE. Recommended CSS var: --font-size-3xl

4xl.description: 4x Extra-large (28px). Purpose: large display headings on wide breakpoints. Figma variable type: FONT_SIZE. Recommended CSS var: --font-size-4xl

5xl.description: 5x Extra-large (32px). Purpose: large hero headings; use sparingly. Figma variable type: FONT_SIZE. Recommended CSS var: --font-size-5xl

6xl.description: 6x Extra-large (34px). Purpose: Display/marketing hero text or large headings. Figma variable type: FONT_SIZE. Recommended CSS var: --font-size-6xl

7xl.description: 7x Extra-large (36px). Purpose: Large marketing display text; use sparingly. Figma variable type: FONT_SIZE. Recommended CSS var: --font-size-7xl

tight.description: Tight (16px) - Use for compact UI text and labels. Figma variable type: NUMBER. CSS var: --line-height-tight.

snug.description: Snug (18px) - Slightly tighter than normal, use for small paragraph text. Figma variable type: NUMBER. CSS var: --line-height-snug.

normal.description: Normal (20px) - Default comfortable reading line height for body text. Figma variable type: NUMBER. CSS var: --line-height-normal.

comfortable.description: Comfortable (22px) - Slightly more breathing room, good for subheadings and mid-weight headlines. Figma variable type: NUMBER. CSS var: --line-height-comfortable.

default.description: Primary button background - default state. References brand pink (#da095e).

hover.description: Primary button background - hover state. 41% lightness, WCAG White AA Normal.

pressed.description: Primary button background - pressed state. 32% lightness, WCAG White AAA Normal.

default.description: Primary button text - default state. White text on pink background.

hover.description: Primary button text - hover state. 89% lightness for subtle contrast reduction.

pressed.description: Primary button text - pressed state. 84% lightness for visual feedback.

default.description: Primary button icon - default state. References primary text color.

hover.description: Primary button icon - hover state. References primary text hover color.

pressed.description: Primary button icon - pressed state. References primary text pressed color.

default.description: Secondary button background - default state. White background.

hover.description: Secondary button background - hover state. 95% lightness for subtle hover effect.

pressed.description: Secondary button background - pressed state. 89% lightness for pressed feedback.

default.description: Secondary button border - default state. References brand purple (#8b006e).

hover.description: Secondary button border - hover state. 41% lightness, darker purple for emphasis.

pressed.description: Secondary button border - pressed state. 32% lightness, darkest purple for pressed state.

default.description: Secondary button text - all states. Black text on white/light backgrounds.

hover.description: Secondary button text - hover state. Consistent black text.

pressed.description: Secondary button text - pressed state. Consistent black text.

default.description: Secondary button icon - default state. References secondary text color.

hover.description: Secondary button icon - hover state. References secondary text hover color.

pressed.description: Secondary button icon - pressed state. References secondary text pressed color.

small.description: Caption Small (12px/16px, Regular). Purpose: UI labels, hints, timestamps, breadcrumbs, metadata. Figma variable type: TYPOGRAPHY. CSS var: --typography-caption-small. Accessibility: default text size for secondary information.

large.description: Display Large (28px/24px, Bold). Purpose: hero headings, marketing banners, page titles, large marketing text. Figma variable type: TYPOGRAPHY. CSS var: --typography-display-large. Accessibility: use for prominent headings with sufficient contrast.

default.description: Link default: Purple (underlined) - primary link color with underline

hover.description: Link hover: slightly darker purple for interactive hover state

visited.description: Link visited: slightly different purple to denote visited color

elevation-negative-1.description: Undercanvas elevation shadow. No visible shadow. Figma type: EFFECT. CSS: --shadow-elevation-negative-1. Z-index: -1. Purpose: content behind sticky elements.

elevation-0.description: Canvas/base elevation shadow. Minimal shadow for definition. Figma type: EFFECT. CSS: --shadow-elevation-0. Z-index: 0. Purpose: base surface with subtle depth.

elevation-1.description: Level 1 elevation shadow. Noticeable depth for cards and floating content. Figma type: EFFECT. CSS: --shadow-elevation-1. Z-index: 1100.

elevation-2.description: Level 2 elevation shadow. Stronger depth for interactive overlays. Figma type: EFFECT. CSS: --shadow-elevation-2. Z-index: 100500.

elevation-3.description: Level 3 elevation shadow. Pronounced depth for persistent elements. Figma type: EFFECT. CSS: --shadow-elevation-3. Z-index: 5001000.

elevation-4.description: Level 4 elevation shadow. Maximum depth for blocking overlays. Figma type: EFFECT. CSS: --shadow-elevation-4. Z-index: 1000+.

elevation-inverse.description: Inverse elevation shadow for dark backgrounds. Light shadow on dark surface. Figma type: EFFECT. CSS: --shadow-elevation-inverse. Z-index: 2000+.

elevation-negative-1.description: Undercanvas surface fill. Hidden/background content behind sticky elements. Figma type: COLOR. CSS: --surface-fill-elevation-negative-1. Z-index: -1.

elevation-0.description: Canvas/base surface fill. Default white background. Figma type: COLOR. CSS: --surface-fill-elevation-0. Z-index: 0.

elevation-1.description: Level 1 surface fill. Subtle tonal shift for cards and floating sections. Figma type: COLOR. CSS: --surface-fill-elevation-1. Z-index: 1100.

elevation-2.description: Level 2 surface fill. Enhanced tonal shift for popovers and overlays. Figma type: COLOR. CSS: --surface-fill-elevation-2. Z-index: 100500.

elevation-3.description: Level 3 surface fill. Strong tonal shift for sticky elements. Figma type: COLOR. CSS: --surface-fill-elevation-3. Z-index: 5001000.

elevation-4.description: Level 4 surface fill. Maximum tonal shift for modals and dialogs. Figma type: COLOR. CSS: --surface-fill-elevation-4. Z-index: 1000+.

elevation-inverse.description: Inverse surface fill. Dark background for dark mode and inverse contexts. Figma type: COLOR. CSS: --surface-fill-elevation-inverse. Z-index: 2000+.

strong.description: Strong accent fill for elevated surfaces. Primary/brand color. Agnostic elevation colorpairs with any level (1-4, canvas, undercanvas). Use for: highlighted cards, featured sections, important emphasis. Figma type: COLOR. CSS: --surface-accent-strong.

figma.usage: Strong accent fillagnostic, for any elevation level

subtle.description: Subtle accent fill for elevated surfaces. Tinted primary at reduced saturation. Agnostic elevation colorpairs with any level. Use for: subtle backgrounds, accent panels, secondary emphasis. Figma type: COLOR. CSS: --surface-accent-subtle.

figma.usage: Subtle accent fillagnostic, for gentle emphasis

fill.description: Undercanvas surface fill. Hidden/background content behind sticky elements. Z-index: -1. Use for: sidebar overlays, background sections, content behind headers.

shadow.description: Undercanvas shadow. No visible shadow. Works with fill to establish -1 elevation context.

fill.description: Canvas surface fill. Base/default level. Z-index: 0. Use for: page backgrounds, primary content area, default surface.

shadow.description: Canvas shadow. Minimal shadow for definition. Z-index: 0.

fill.description: Level 1 surface fill. Cards, floating sections. Z-index: 1100. Use for: card backgrounds, tabs, section containers on canvas.

shadow.description: Level 1 shadow. Noticeable depth. Indicates content elevated above canvas.

accent-strong.description: Level 1 strong accent fill. Primary color paired with level-1 surface. Use for: highlighted cards, featured sections on level 1.

accent-subtle.description: Level 1 subtle accent fill. Tinted primary paired with level-1 surface. Use for: accent panels, secondary emphasis on level 1.

fill.description: Level 2 surface fill. Popovers, dropdowns, context menus. Z-index: 100500. Use for: floating UI near interaction point.

shadow.description: Level 2 shadow. Stronger depth. Indicates urgent/interactive overlay.

accent-strong.description: Level 2 strong accent fill. Primary color paired with level-2 surface. Use for: highlighted popovers, featured dropdowns.

accent-subtle.description: Level 2 subtle accent fill. Tinted primary paired with level-2 surface. Use for: accent sections in tooltips, secondary UI on level 2.

fill.description: Level 3 surface fill. Sticky headers, persistent navigation. Z-index: 5001000. Use for: sticky elements that persist across scroll.

shadow.description: Level 3 shadow. Pronounced depth. Indicates persistent, sticky positioning.

accent-strong.description: Level 3 strong accent fill. Primary color paired with level-3 surface. Use for: highlighted sticky header sections.

accent-subtle.description: Level 3 subtle accent fill. Tinted primary paired with level-3 surface. Use for: accent badges in sticky elements.

fill.description: Level 4 surface fill. Modals, dialogs, alerts. Z-index: 1000+. Use for: full-screen overlays, critical dialogs.

shadow.description: Level 4 shadow. Maximum depth. Indicates modal/blocking overlay.

accent-strong.description: Level 4 strong accent fill. Primary color paired with level-4 surface. Use for: highlighted modal sections, important dialog content.

accent-subtle.description: Level 4 subtle accent fill. Tinted primary paired with level-4 surface. Use for: accent panels in modals.

fill.description: Inverse surface fill. Dark backgrounds, dark mode, high-contrast overlays. Z-index: 2000+. Use for: dark theme surfaces, inverse UI patterns.

shadow.description: Inverse shadow. Light shadow on dark background. Maintains depth in dark contexts.
